title: Video: 'UFC 244 Countdown' for Kelvin Gastelum vs. Darren Till co-main event
text:
Did you miss the debut of “UFC 244 Countdown,” or just want to watch it again? Check out the main event preview now.

The segment takes a special look at the middleweight fight between former title challengers Kelvin Gastelum (16-4 MMA, 10-4 UFC) and Darren Till (17-2-1 MMA, 5-2-1 UFC).

UFC 244 takes place Saturday at Madison Square Garden in New York. The main card airs on pay-per-view following prelims on ESPN2 and ESPN2/ESPN+/UFC Fight Pass.

“Countdown” goes behind the scenes with the two fighters, and you can watch the full segment above. And don’t miss the segment for the main event welterweight “BMF” fight between Jorge Masvidal and Nate Diaz below.
